creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
portfolio: "Echo #3" suite, from “Morfología del Eco” (Morphology of the Echo) series
provenance: The artist, Havana, Cuba, sold to Mersky, 2019; Robert B. Mersky, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2019.
signed: on back in pencil: RAFAEL VILLARES, 2015 / Eco #3 / (Dibujos de la Serie Mortologia del Eco) / 3/16 / -RAYO EN SUDAFRICA- / (diagram) / tinat / cartolina 300g / Villares
text: Suite of 16 monochromatic ink drawings of the intricate branching systems of rivers, plant roots, lightning bolts, and blood vessels.
title: Lightning Bolt in South Africa, February 2007, from "Echo #3"
